column1: Digital Business and Data Analytics - MSc
column5:
This Masters degree equips you with the hands-on skills in data analytics, computing and business to transform data into increased value to customers and improve business processes.
              



               It will enable your understanding of the role of data and analytics in decision making, organisation management and policy shaping. Youâ€™ll be well prepared for technologist and analyst
